def api_url(self, resource=None): """ Builds the REST API URL from its parts.
:param resource: The resource path to append to the base URL. :return: The REST URL to the specified resource. """ url = (f'https://{self.api_id}.execute-api.{self.apig_client.meta.region_name}' f'.amazonaws.com/{self.stage}') if resource is not None: url = f'{url}/{resource}' return url
